nodes.text: Capital landing platform A-627 was located on the planet Zygerria. During the Clone Wars, Galactic Republic operatives went on an undercover mission to the Separatist-aligned planet, where they were instructed to land at capital landing platform A-627.
Capital landing platform A-627 first appeared in the 2008 Star Wars Legends comic book The Clone Wars 3, written by Henry Gilroy.
